greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of prime factors of p^p - 1 where p is prime.
mathematica: PrimeNu/@Table[p^p-1,{p,Prime[Range[30]]}] (* The program takes a long time to run. *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 05 2020 *)
program: (PARI) omegaptop(n,m) = { sr=0; forprime(x=2,n, y=omega(x^x-m); print1(y","); sr += 1.0/y; ); print(); }
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Nov 23 2003
